DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation of an possible inhibiting effect of Rimonabant on the analgesic effect of Paracetamol in healthy volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: Double Blind, cross-over, randomized and controlled versus placebo, study in healthy volunteers.
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteers between 18 and 40 years old written consent given Rimonabant or paracetamol hypersensibility Excessive consumption of alcohol, tobacco, coffee, tea or toxicomania Concomitant medication Chronical diseases
